撫.definition: to comfort; to console; to stroke; to caress; an old term for province or provincial governor

撫卹.definition: (of an organization that has a duty of care) to give financial support to relatives of sb who has died or suffered serious injury

撫州.definition: see 撫州市|抚州市[Fu3zhou1 Shi4]

撫州市.definition: Fuzhou, prefecture-level city in Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1xi1 Sheng3]

撫平.definition: to flatten; to smooth down; to unwrinkle; (fig.) to soothe (emotional wounds); to heal (scars)

撫弄.definition: to fondle; to caress; to stroke

撫愛.definition: to love tenderly; affection; loving care; to caress

撫慰.definition: to console; to comfort; to soothe

撫慰金.definition: pension or lump-sum payment for the injured or for the family of the deceased

撫摸.definition: to gently caress and stroke; to pet; to fondle

撫松.definition: Fusong county in Baishan 白山, Jilin

撫松縣.definition: Fusong county in Baishan 白山, Jilin

撫琴.definition: to play the zither; classical variant of 彈琴|弹琴[tan2 qin2]

撫育.definition: to nurture; to raise; to foster; to tend

撫遠三角洲.definition: Bolshoi Ussuriisk Island in the Heilongjiang or Amur river, at mouth of the Ussuri River opposite Khabarovsk; same as Heixiazi Island 黑瞎子島|黑瞎子岛[Hei1 xia1 zi5 Dao3]

撫順.definition: see 撫順市|抚顺市[Fu3shun4 Shi4]; see 撫順縣|抚顺县[Fu3shun4 Xian4]

撫順市.definition: Fushun, prefecture-level city in Liaoning Province 遼寧省|辽宁省[Liao2ning2 Sheng3]

撫順縣.definition: Fushun county in Fushun 撫順|抚顺, Liaoning

撫養.definition: to foster; to bring up; to raise
